prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Drums, Brass, Bass, Guitar, but without Piano.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Drums, Brass, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Drums, Brass, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is not included.

Style 3:
The instruments used in this song are Drums, Brass, Bass, and Guitar, but Piano is not part of it.
